messages.message: I want to hover over "FAIL" on validation rule in build to see if there's a validation failure message for it but the edit button keeps blocking it. Wondering if there's even anything while hovering over the fail result.

I'm not able to see any hidden tooltips that get quickly obscured, but the feedback makes sense.

cc @alagu to consider for a redesigned build configuration panel - I could see someone wanting to see more details in this situation. They could always click into it to get more info but it is a bit misleading.
